jobDescription: Job Description Primary duty will be to streamline code coming from the team for production implementation. Responsibility includes updating existing logic to read from Oracle reference tables and generating exception reports. Additional Job Details: 1 to 4 years of experience developing code in Base SAS or SAS Enterprise Guide, Highly Proficient in SQL and familiarity with Oracle Expertise in data analysis. Self-motivated, problem solver. Comfortable in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Knowledge of Interface intuitive design principles, primarily related to reporting and dashboard Good written communication skills; comfortable writing documentation describing logic within code Familiarity with MS Visio a plus
